definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to press charges/to file a complaint
to press charges/to file a complaint
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to leave/to bid farewell to/to say good-bye to

sentences.english: I didn't understand until you tell me.
I have just received your letter telling me your recent marriage.
sentences.chinese: 顷接来函，承你告我近日结婚。

sentences.english: Eight salute to heaven and earth, let the heavens and the earth for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 八门礼炮告天地，同心同德天地久。

sentences.english: 8226; He ran for the Vice-presidential nomination in 1856, and lost that too.
sentences.chinese: 1856年，他竞选副总统候选人提名，也告失利。

sentences.english: Give back my toy, or I will tell Dad on you.
sentences.chinese: 把东西还给我，否则的话我赴向爸爸告你状。

sentences.english: When I got home. I rushed into the house to tell my wife what I was going to do.
sentences.chinese: 抵家的时期，我冲进屋里，念睹告老婆我的筹算。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Shandong reported that this new deep-water port in the early 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 该港是山东告80年代初新辟的深水港。

sentences.english: You mean to tell me you've never been up there doing a little cloud-seeding?
sentences.chinese: 你不要告我你从未做过云端撒种这种事？

sentences.english: His sister told on him though he tried to shush her.
sentences.chinese: 尽管他想叫她别声张，可妹妹还是告了他。

sentences.english: The last time the Spurs have been nothing back, was forced to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 马刺最后时刻的反扑也告无功而返，被迫缴械投降。

sentences.english: Pls. adv. price breakdown and delivery term.
sentences.chinese: 告价格细目表及发货条件。

sentences.english: He often tells on his classmates.
The Coliseum was used for shows until 608 AD.
sentences.chinese: 竞技场的演出用途到了公元608年才告结束。

sentences.english: Tom broke the window and Mary told the teacher on Tom.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆打破了玻璃，玛丽在老师那儿告了他一状。

sentences.english: During the retreat from Caporetto Henry had made his farewell to arms.
sentences.chinese: 在从卡波雷托撤退的过程中，亨利向武器告了别。

sentences.english: And the jews also assented , saying that these things were so.
sentences.chinese: 众犹太人也随着告他说，事情诚然是这样。

to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
variant of 誣衊|诬蔑[wu1 mie4]
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to report a case to the authorities (old)
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
